system.description: Effect: The user freely moves up to 6m into the air, resolving this attack afterward. The the user does not take damage from falling until their next Activation. On hit, the target becomes @Affliction[grounded] 5.

actions.name: Missile Kick
actions.description: Effect: The user freely moves up to 6m into the air, resolving this attack afterward. The the user does not take damage from falling until their next Activation. On hit, the target becomes @Affliction[grounded] 5.
